title: Update build documentation
description: Clarify build instructions in README.md based on the verified build process.

title: Solve message play in production issue
description:
When building the vibe cast app in production, triggering messages does not show. It works well in development mode.

This is quite likely because of the difference in how the visualization window is opened in production, where it is re-started in order to make a fix for youtbue playback. Note, youtbue playback should still be working without error 153 in production builds

As a part of this work, a comprehensive testing strategy needs to be developed, so it is possible to test without a human in the loop.

title: Test messages in production
description: There needs to be a way to automatically test is messages are shown for the production build of the app

title: Debug information for production
description: When running in production mode, it should be possible to get debug information. The current overlay (cmd+shift+d) does not show up. This might be the same issue as the messages now showing

title: Make sure messages show in production
description: Messages should show in production when triggered. Currently they only show as playing but nothing happens.

title: Go through all the documentation in README.md and docs/ and consolidate as much as possible, removing non-needed documentation, and especially and update to current status of code
Create E2E test script for built app
description: Develop a script/method to run the built application with a specific configuration (fast playing messages) to verify functionality without manual intervention.

title: Verify and fix production build process
description: Ensure 'npm run tauri build' works correctly, verifying that the bundling cleanup was effective and resources (remote control) are correctly included in the final .app. Investigate the role of bundle_dmg.sh.

title: Use Tauri bundling
description: Current bundling for mac os uses a shell script. Clean this up to use Tauri-standard bundling

title: Document changes
description: Review the project documentation. Update README.md, API docs, or internal documentation (in docs/ folder) to reflect the changes, new features, or architectural updates. Ensure the 'AGENTS.md' or similar context files are updated if the system behavior has changed significantly.

title: Investigate and summarize task
description: Investigate the requirements and context for this epic. Analyze the request, explore relevant codebase areas using search tools, and summarize the findings. Update the parent epic's description with a clear 'Context & Analysis' section detailing the technical approach and architectural considerations.

title: Document changes
description: Review the project documentation. Update README.md, API docs, or internal documentation (in docs/ folder) to reflect the changes, new features, or architectural updates. Ensure the 'AGENTS.md' or similar context files are updated if the system behavior has changed significantly.

title: Implement failing tests
description: Create a reproduction test case or a new unit/integration test that targets the desired functionality. Ensure the test fails (Red phase of TDD), confirming it accurately captures the missing feature or bug. Use the project's testing framework conventions.

title: Implement failing tests
description: Create a reproduction test case or a new unit/integration test that targets the desired functionality. Ensure the test fails (Red phase of TDD), confirming it accurately captures the missing feature or bug. Use the project's testing framework conventions.

title: Find relevant code-parts and tests
description: Identify and list relevant file paths, code symbols (functions, classes), and existing tests. Use 'glob' and 'search_file_content' to map the affected areas. Append this list to the parent epic's description under a 'Relevant Code & Tests' section to guide implementation.

title: Clean up presets
description: The default presets should include standard fireplace, blue glow fireplace (fireplace without logs, embers, or flames, and a calm blue base), a slideshow with some example images, particles but with slightly larger and slower particles, the current youtube preset, the techno preset without the blob. The default text style presets should also include a larger scrolling capitals that is centered, and a message that uses it. There should be an example folder of messages with three parts: 1) Countdown initiated... in typewriter, 2) 3, 2, 1 split on comma with bounce and 1 second per part, 3) large scrolling capitals centered with It's time to party <0001f973>

title: Robust handling of re-ordering of active visualizations
description: Currently, the re-ordering using drag and drop of visualization presets is not working.

title: Implement the feature
description: Implement the core logic and changes required for the epic. Modify the code to satisfy the requirements and pass the newly created tests. Follow project coding standards and architectural patterns.

title: Verify tests pass
description: Run the full test suite, focusing on the new tests and any related existing tests. Verify that the changes satisfy the requirements and do not introduce regressions. Fix any issues until all relevant tests pass (Green phase of TDD).
